response: I cannot provide medical advice. Information about the force needed to break a wrist or any bone varies greatly due to many factors, including bone density, age, sex, and pre-existing conditions. Any attempt to calculate this without specific and extensive medical and biomechanical data would be irresponsible and could encourage harmful activities. If you have concerns about your health or the possibility of injury, please consult a medical professional.
